name: Steamer Mexican Hot Layer Dip
preparation: Place beef in a Rectangular Steamer. Microwave for 3 minutes on HIGH. Remove from microwave and drain excess fat. Sprinkle with Fajita Seasoning.
Layer salsa and guacamole over beef, and top with cheese.
Return to microwave for 2 minutes to melt cheese. Top with lettuce and serve.

products.name: Fajita Seasoning
summary: A lively, mild blend for seasoning beef, chicken, or fish fajitas & enchiladas.

products.name: Poco Picante Salsa Mix
summary: The vibrant flavours of cayenne, chillies, and garlic come together to create a zesty salsa with a medium kick.

products.name: Guacamole Dip Mix
summary: An all-natural blend of sweet peppers, garlic, and chilies comes together to create the perfect guacamole––minus the sodium and additives!

products.name: Rectangular Steamer
summary: Easy to clean. Easy to serve. Rectangular, silicone steamer is perfect for side dishes & desserts.
